summary: Provides comprehensive data preparation utilities for CLIP multimodal models, including lightweight ImageNet class handling, construction of training and validation datasets, image and text preprocessing pipelines, tokenization, custom collation, and seamless integration with WebDataset and Megatron samplers.
business_intent: Facilitate scalable and efficient training of CLIP models by streamlining data loading, preprocessing, and sampling of large image-text corpora for research and production environments.
